## dl-asset package

## Interfaces

|  Interface | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [DownloadOpts](./dl-asset.downloadopts.md) |  |

## Variables

|  Variable | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [download](./dl-asset.download.md) | Triggers download of given <code>src</code> blob (or typed array or string) as local file with filename <code>name</code>. MIME type, text encoding and URL expiry can be defined via the optional <code>opts</code> config object. See [DownloadOpts](./dl-asset.downloadopts.md) for details &amp; defaults. |
